iceworksMaterialHelper.configuration.aut: After created folders under src/pages/, src/components/, create a index.j[t]sx file automatically
After created a folder, the index.j[t]sx file is created automatically
After created the index.j[t]sx file in src/ folder, automatically complete the component declaration code according to the filename
After created the index.j[t]sx file, the component code will be completed automatically
